1: <pb/><e>Bit yet David chi bitnelay yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Tolok ta maj oc Jehová jetok ¿tzet mi wal max on oni? Yalokab Israel axca ti':</t>
2: <t>Tolok ta a Jehová maj oc jetok yet max aj wan eb anima yak'on yowal jin,</t>
3: <t>xam on turaytok eb yin jiquisal, yet max caktzaj tit yowal eb jin.</t>
4: <t>Axcaxac'al mi tol chon ilay bey yuj a' elom aej, chon mi c'ayil yuj yowal c'ul eb jin.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová, yujtol maj yal c'ul max on coc'axtok yuj is ye eb.</t>
7: <t>Maj yak' ba co can yul yal eb. Axca wal chi yun colchaj jun tz'iquin chi col ba yul k'ab nak aom ay yal; max nic'chajtok jun yal tu', cax max on colchaji.</t>
8: <t>A bay Jehová chi tit colwal, a ton cham Yesnemal aj satcan, c'al sat tx'otx' ti'.</t>
